name: Loop Core
details:
Looper pedal, a cheaper BOSS RC-3Turbo-charged version of our original, and now, the most versatile Looper available! Sure, we covered all the basics in a Looper that allows you to record and play back multiple layers, but now we've added a whole new level of goodies.  Featuring 40 built-in drum patterns and 99 Personal-User memories--and now, a whole new array of carefully thought-out user assists.  Whether you practice, compose, or play live gigs, you’ll be inspired by the ground-breaking features of the all new NUX Loop Core!
http://www.nuxefx.com/show-49-18-1.html
